subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike D’Antoni praised Amar’e Stoudemire, who made six All-Star appearances playing for D’Antoni despite a sometimes strained relationship, for his new defensive attitude.
snippet: Coach Mike D’Antoni praised Amar’e Stoudemire, who made six All-Star appearances playing for D’Antoni despite a sometimes strained relationship, for his new defensive attitude.
